Dear Mr. {{doc.applicant_name}}

{% set ns = namespace(report_on='') %} {% for offer_term in doc.offer_terms %} {% if offer_term.offer_term == 'Report On' %} {% set ns.report_on = offer_term.value %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% set job_detail = frappe.get_doc("Job Opening",applicant_detail.job_title) %} This is with reference to your application & subsequent interviews you had with us, we are pleased to offer you the position of {{doc.designation}} based at {{frappe.get_doc("Address",applicant_detail.custom_work_location).city}} with our organization. Please bring the following along with you at the time of joining.

  1. {{ doc_info_list[0].required_document }}
    2. {% endif %} {% endfor %}

You are requested to report on or before {{ns.report_on}} at {{frappe.get_doc("Address",applicant_detail.custom_work_location).city}} . In case you fail to report on this date unless otherwise agreed in written the offer shall stand automatically withdrawn.

If on verification, at the time of appointment or later it is found that you have furnished wrong information, in such cases your services with the company will be liable to termination.

Please sign, return to us the duplicate copy of this letter as a token of your acceptance of this offer, and send it to us within 7 working days. We welcome you to the IndiFOSS family and to the beginning of a long and mutually beneficial association.



With Best Wishes
For, {{doc.company}}
